name: Cornerway House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beautiful home with private entrances to the rooms. Room was small but clean and the bed was very comfortable. Robin and Dee, the propietors, invited us for a drink in the evening and although Robin is a bit chatty, he did share his extensive knowlege about the area and made a good recommendation for dinner. Breakfast the next morning was delicious and Robin recommended we stop at a new animal park that had just opened - Teniqua. Had he not mentioned it we would have missed out on seeing a very special place indeed. Cornerway House is well located in Plett and we would definately stay there again if we were in the area.
reviews.title: Friendly Hosts

reviews.text: Having never travelled to South Africa before I was not sure what to expect. However I was pleasantly surprised when I turned up at Cornerway House. Its location was very easy to find and the welcome was warm.
reviews.title: Brilliant place to stay in Plett

reviews.text: Breakfast every morning was more than enough to get me started for the day and I appreciated having the (very friendly) owner around to talk to about the surrounding attractions in Plett.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

likes.liked: — The friendliness of the hosts and the comfort of the rooms

reviews.title: A Fantastic Getaway
reviews.text: Overall it was fantastic value for money and just the right balance of privacy and hospitality.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks to Robin (and Dee) for a wonderful stay.
reviews.title: Lovely property, great hosts

description: Cornerway House **** is a Cape/Dutch style house set in a pretty garden with a swimming pool. It is situated in a residential area and only 7 minutes walk from the golden sands of Robberg beach. It has 7 individually decorated bedrooms all en-suite and with their own entrance. Thers is also a self catering appartment to sleep 3. Children by arrangement. All dog lovers welcome and pets are alowed by arrangement.
